title: luxury stationery
content:
I’m researching luxury stationery manufacturers that engrave, and so far have only found Smythsons and Pineider.  
Do you know of another?
author: miles

comments.content: A google search shows a few, but only Crane & Co look near luxurious.

I’m not sure how you define luxury. The engraver I have used for many years is Artcraft, in southern Massachusetts. They can order any paper (Crane or otherwise) and will do any design with great skill.

[http://www.artcraft.com/Index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20070403074246/http:/www.artcraft.com/Index.html)

Just don’t be in a hurry to get the work.

Nota bene: There is an Artcraft engraving company in Florida as well, but I know nothing about them.

The company with whom [Louise Fili](http://web.archive.org/wiki/Louise%20Fili) partnered to produce the book [A Designer’s Guide to Italy](http://web.archive.org/web/20070403074246/http:/louisefili.com/books/b2b.html#), [Darby Litho](http://web.archive.org/), more than likely does this sort of thing.
